summary: adds the ability to make blood potions for vampires!
descriptionHtml:
added the ability to make blood potions to sate your thirst as a vampire. 

features:

craft blood potions at a cooking station. i, myself, thought this
more appropriate than using an alchemy station.

it requires 2 venison, and 1 salt pile. giving it that extra salty
goodness!


any feedback on bugs and conflicts will be looked into and fixed, 
however i have been playing with it since dawngaurd and noticed 
no compatibility issues.

hope you enjoy. 

rate and endorse if you love it!
author: xirishx
